text: Ground fighting (in martial arts sometimes referred to as "ground work" or "ground game") is hand-to-hand combat which takes place while the fighters are on the ground, generally involving a degree of clutching of gripping. ==Other websites== *Free Jiu-Jitsu and Submission Grappling Videos *David Thomas' Ground Fighting Technique Catalog *www.lockflow.com/techniques.php Illustrated explanations of groundfighting techniques *www.bjj.org/techniques/ Guides to groundfighting and grappling techniques, with illustrations and some videos *www.bjjzone.com Grappling Technique Videos *Submission Grappling Demo - 7 minutes Category:Martial art techniques
